alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Kossuth; Winnebago (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 9:30PM CDT until June 24 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Kossuth County in north central Iowa... Northwestern Hancock County in north central Iowa... Southwestern Winnebago County in north central Iowa... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 930 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sexton, or 9 miles east of Algona, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Titonka around 945 PM CDT. Woden around 950 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Crystal Lake and Forest City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
